attributes.action: Scrap the EU deal and leave on an agreed no deal.
attributes.additional_details:
We should be stressing to the EU that we are a great partners and trading freely benefits everyone. Let’s face it, we import more than we export at the end of the day. 

Stress to them EU citizens rights will be protected. 

Let’s keep tourism flowing & offer a 90 day fee free visa for EU citizens

If we do the above we will control our boaders, laws, money and show the EU we want to work with them closely, just not be dictated to anymore.
attributes.background:
We voted to leave and democratically that is what we should do. We don’t need a deal to do this. 

Stress to the EU keeping our trading agreement as is, would be best for all. Use smart boarder tech in NI and Gibraltar. 

No backstop & no worry for businesses on both ends.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/229963

If you would like to petition about specific changes to tourists visas or the borders of Northern Ireland and Gibraltar, you could start a new petition about those topics.
